website_summaries.verdict: A lot of variety for those learning how to knit in a kit that has a bargain price.
pros: Lots of options for different knitting projects
Useful for someone who is learning to knit
Includes scissors that work well as backups
cons: The tape measure is not precisely accurate

customer_reviews.title: Great starter or travel kit. Many tools for a low proce
customer_reviews.text: Excellent starter or travel kit for knitting or crocheting. Buying the container and all the tools would cost at least 5x the price here. I’m using this to carry my tools with my knitting projects while commuting or waiting for appointments.
customer_reviews.author: B Perlik

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this to beginnets all the way to advanced knitters
customer_reviews.text: I used to knit many years ago n was interested in re-learning this craft. I had first looked 'in the craft store' and their pricrs were almost twice as much more. The kit has basically everything to get going cept the yarn. I would recommend this to beginnets all the way to advanced knitters.
customer_reviews.author: Laura B.

customer_reviews.title: A handy box to have to organize "stuff," be it sewing kit or nuts & bolts.....
customer_reviews.text: The RATE FEATURES are misleading. I was looking for the box itself and some of the items that were inside were a bonus for me. Made overseas so no surprise there. Seems to be durable however don't be throwing it across the room trying to nail your husband or one of the kids because, after all, it's made of plastic or other synthetic material. They wear well but don't well with being dropped down the cellar stairs or flung across the room and the receiver drops it.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit. Throw away the measuring tape.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little starter kit for people starting to knit. Has everything you would need for a basic project (stitch marker, needle covers, tapestry needle. It is also great for traveling in case you lose things you don't feel bad about losing $3-4 worth of stuff. I agree with other people about the measuring tape - toss it. Only the cm are accurate, inches are WAY off!! This would be a great gift item if you wanted to make a DIY kit for someone to start knitting, this with needles, yarn and a pattern! All set!
customer_reviews.author: JennyfromBoston

customer_reviews.title: it is as small as others said it was.
customer_reviews.text: has all the necessities, but it is small. The previous reviews mentioned that, so I was expecting it, but it is still useful and a good idea for the new knitter, in case they lose interest, you have not invested too much money.
customer_reviews.author: llainey

customer_reviews.title: Careful for the ruler!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little starter kit that has all the little accessories you need to begin knitting. My only complaint is that the ruler is extraordinarily inaccurate. DO NOT BASE YOUR GAUGE ON IT. I held it up to a measuring tape and my husband and I had a good laugh at how off it was. Other than that this kit it is well worth the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: Atrain

customer_reviews.title: The listing was accurate but...
customer_reviews.text: The smell that this product had when it arrived made it unusable. Additionally something in the plastic on the stitch markers made my skin ache and breakout. I kept the sheers, but threw out the rest. For the price, I'm not too upset, but I was left a little disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Bob "Mad Bomber" Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice assortment of tools. Most were items I already have, but it'a nice to have different sizes of most knitting tools. They're not the nicest I've owned, but they're good quality and I haven't had any issues with anything included. The case is nice to have included and very convenient. Good value on a nice set of tools.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Clark

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Travel Size Knit-Kit!
customer_reviews.text: This is the PERFECT travel size tool kit for knitters! I absolutely love it! It even has those cute little metal stitch markers, that are great for lace knitting, as well as the o-ring and locking, plus all the little things you need to carry, except one- a crochet hook, which a knitter should never be without. I hope I have one to fit in this compact little kit. For $4.16, you cannot beat it! Perfect stocking stuffer, too!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie King

customer_reviews.title: Great starter's kit
customer_reviews.text: This kit really comes with everything you could need. Needle tips, scissors, pins, you name it. I bought this as I don't have any kind of kit for myself as I'm knitting and it has what I need. I also feel like this would make a great gift to someone who's starting to get into knitting. the plastic box does a great job of keeping everything in one place. Overall, I'm really happy with this buy!
customer_reviews.author: EmyS.

customer_reviews.title: A nice set
customer_reviews.text: A good set of supplies in a convenient package. Has enough of everything to get someone started with projects or enough to use if you are travelling and cannot bring a full set of supplies. The case is also very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Is it a cheap set? Yes! Still very handy. Knitting cable needles were not smooth but still functional. Scissors are sharper than I expected and very portable. The plastic markers are very handy. (I wish there were more of them and less of the metal safety pin style) The little plastic container is adjustable and closed well but doesn't keep things separated if turned over. Still functional for travel and storage though. Overall this is a very functional set. Was a good price with fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was impressed with all the different tools included in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Was impressed with all the different tools included in the small case. Everything a crafter needed. Plastic case was ok but latch was a bit flimsy. Have to really make sure you push it tight to latch otherwise everything will fall out. Other than that would definitely buy again or send as a gift to my crafty friends.
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: This is a handy collection of tools for knitting. I keep it by my chair so I have what I need without digging for anything. The scissors cut well!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Tuning

customer_reviews.title: Nice selection of simple knitting tools
customer_reviews.text: Nice bunch of simple knitting accessories. Box clasp was broken on arrival, which is why I rated it lower for giftability. Arrived promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Spokannie

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little knitting accessories kit.
customer_reviews.text: This was smaller than I expected (only because I'm not good with measurements. I'm sure the size is what they said it would be, I was just expecting it to be bigger), but actually this worked out great - fitting into my knitting bag. Everything I need going forward with my knitting projects - all in one easily accessible place. I would highly recommend this product. Thank you. Jan S.
customer_reviews.author: Janice A. Sandalow

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and awesome price!
customer_reviews.text: This kit is amazing. It has so many useful components all in a secure little case. The price was a huge seller for me but the quality so far has been above and beyond my expectations. I just got standard shipping which took a couple weeks (I believe these are shipped from China). I did get mine about a week before the projected delivery range which was a great surprise. I'm thinking of buying a few more as presents for other knitting buddies.
customer_reviews.author: Roxi

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize this was so small but I am keeping it anyway. I am a beginner knitter. This fits nicely in the caddy I bought here on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Myers Glower

customer_reviews.title: Measuring Madness
customer_reviews.text: So I liked all the things you get in it and as a knitter that was big deal to get all the notions in something I can just throw in my purse. so it would have gotten a higher rating however since measuring your gauge can be extremely important to your projects I had to bump off 2 stars. The measuring tape was off by like 25% and I measured it in different spots throughout the tape. So I have knit picks 4 inch dpns and it said they were 3 inch long so If the tape measure is your reason for buying this item just remember that if you get this item you will likely have to chuck it.
customer_reviews.author: Stina

customer_reviews.title: comes in handy
customer_reviews.text: this is very handy and has everything you need. and it even comes with additional dividers
customer_reviews.author: Willis

customer_reviews.title: I got this for a Christmas present and the person ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a Christmas present and the person I gave it to really likes it. She likes the fact that it is compact, contains what she needs and it keeps all the little things together so she doesn't loose them so fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These little kits (I bought two) are just exactly what ...
customer_reviews.text: These little kits (I bought two) are just exactly what every knitter or crochet enthusiast needs. The only thing I added to make my knitting bag complete was a metal yarn tapestry needle. Can't believe how complete and compact these kits are. I will be buy more as Presents for my Knitting Companions and Friends. A+ Seller gets a BIG Thank You from me!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anne N. Stoddard

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre quality
customer_reviews.text: I attained all the listed items, but a few of the items definitely look second hand, namely the scissors and the stitch ripper. There are scratches, the blade is sticky, and extremely rough to the touch.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: All in all a great deal. But throw that tape measure out or ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything in this kit is usable except the measuring tape. The measuring tape is way off. An inch equals about 1-1/4 inches. That's OK. I bought it for the cable needles. The box is handy for carrying stitch markers and such. It even came with extra dividers. All in all a great deal. But throw that tape measure out or your knitting gauge will be way off!
customer_reviews.author: Lefty

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I find this really useful for my project bag. I read several complaints regarding the tape measure. Mine came with an extra tape measure which was in centimeters and American inches. There was a slight oil residue on the yarn nippers. I just wiped with an alcohol gauze and was good to go. I have since ordered kits for my sister who crochets and a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Just enough
customer_reviews.text: Great for traveling and for my craft and knitting bags
customer_reviews.author: Diva180

customer_reviews.title: received a broken item inside the kit...and can't return it
customer_reviews.text: ONe of the thread ripper cap was completely broken when I received few days ago and the measure tape was off as other reviews mentioned. The worst part is apparently I can't return it.
customer_reviews.author: mt

customer_reviews.title: really comes in handy. a good buy
customer_reviews.text: so many things included! they thought of everything. happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Renee Barnett

customer_reviews.title: A great starter kit for knitting tools
customer_reviews.text: A great starter kit for knitting tools. Everything you need in one handy little box that slips right into my knitting bag!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Travel case helps me not loose things, sometimes
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time, the only downside is I loose all of the pieces but that's more on me than the product so it's still getting 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Tara Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Customer; Knitter
customer_reviews.text: I like my new knitting tools. The case is so well organized and clear so that you can see what's inside without having to open. Very handy to put in knitting bag for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Shopperlady

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect little kit for any knitter. I am a beginner and took it to a knit shop and everyone there loves it and was so impressed. Each of these things separately can get expensive, but I've had just about everything I've needed so far and it so inexpensive!highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Item is smaller than what I expected. I am sure it will come in handy.
customer_reviews.author: VANESSA A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice little set
customer_reviews.text: Everything is there that you need for your knitting, it's for a gift but I just might buy myself one. Came from overseas so I didn't get it fast but that wasn't a problem when I bought it so it didn't bother me. Came in great shape for coming so far and was a few dollars cheaper than getting it faster.
customer_reviews.author: D. Reis

customer_reviews.title: Good items to have when knitting.
customer_reviews.text: The items included were very useable, and I understood that the shipping would take longer since it wasn't on Prime. I thought that the items included a knit counter. There was no list of items. It took almost 3 weeks to receive it. So, I will go buy a knit counter. I like the items that it did include.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Parlett

customer_reviews.title: this kit is awesome! It may have taken a long time to ...
customer_reviews.text: WOW!! this kit is awesome! It may have taken a long time to get here, but it was like Christmas all over again. Not only was there all the things I needed for my knitting , there are snips for thread, tweezers, and and a seam ripper.
customer_reviews.author: JeanieLou

customer_reviews.title: It's something
customer_reviews.text: It's really not as shown, and it doesn't explain what anything is. It's definitely for someone who's been crafting for a while and not someone who is learning the basics.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A nice assortment of essentials. Contains everything necessary to complete most projects.
customer_reviews.author: WLReader

customer_reviews.title: I really liked some of the items in this
customer_reviews.text: I really liked some of the items in this, then when measuring something i found the tape measure to be way off the mark. 12 inches on a regular ruler was only 9 inches on this. I did like the needle point covers, cable needles, and stitch markers.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: It is small and compact.
customer_reviews.text: I was just looking for a cable needle, but this little case intrigued me. I plan to take it with me when traveling, and it has just the bare minimum of things I would want.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Page

customer_reviews.title: Tiny!!
customer_reviews.text: This product looks like a miniature of what appears in the seller's picture. It look like a kit for a dollhouse. As others have stated, the measuring tape is not useable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good basic set
customer_reviews.text: Great little set with all the basic pieces I needed for much less than in stores near me. I tossed the odd tape measure since it is not inches, but everything else is just what I needed. Be warned - shipping is very slow, I ordered at Thanksgiving and it arrived Christmas Eve.
customer_reviews.author: A mom in Nebraska

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Great price for all the little extras you need in needle crafting.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Mayes

customer_reviews.title: Knitting tools
customer_reviews.text: Cute tool box of knitting tools, everything that you could possibly need to complete the process of knitting, wonderful!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: G. Norman

customer_reviews.title: Everything is adequate except the measuring tape
customer_reviews.text: This kit nicely provided the basics, but as others have stated the measuring tape doesn't measure up.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Fisk

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice little kit. Very tiny though, smaller then a wallet. Ignore the tape measure its way off
customer_reviews.author: James Noonan

customer_reviews.title: Estone Basic Knitting Tools with Case
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used all of the items in the case yet; there are so many. I like that the case is small and it has several compartments to fit the stitch markers and holders, little scissors, yarn needles and even a cute finger guard.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Lindholm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This little kit is really nice and handy and could be used for knitting tools or crochet tools.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy A

customer_reviews.title: Supper Handy
customer_reviews.text: So handy to have on hand. Always in my knitting bag. Only one complaint and that is the tape measure is not correct. I can forgive this.
customer_reviews.author: huggy 5350

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: I like everything that came in the kit, however most of the clips came broken and the rest have since broken.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: No return policy
customer_reviews.text: Product was damaged upon arrival and there is a no return policy. Not sure what to do about this.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Totton

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on this kit
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for it. Most spacers are already broke since they snap when removed. Don't waste your money on this kit. It's just junk.
customer_reviews.author: Irmgard Brown

customer_reviews.title: Knitting Accessories
customer_reviews.text: I don't use all the tools in this set frequently, but they have come in handy when I needed them. Good set for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Carly Jacobsma

customer_reviews.title: The scissors don’t close easily.
customer_reviews.text: This has got to be the tiniest sewing kit I’ve ever seen. Even the pieces are tiny. The scissors don’t close easily.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Cash

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For the price I can't believe how much stuff is in this little package.
customer_reviews.author: HeidiB

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Handle was broken when I opened the box. Rubber band took care of it 😉
customer_reviews.author: dave fralick

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but long shipping
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint is the time it took to arrive (almost a month), other than that it is a great little box with many things for knitting and the scissors are sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Has everything a knitter needs in one small case. Using it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Izzo

customer_reviews.title: I like to have them
customer_reviews.text: Just bought for extra weird things. I like to have them.
customer_reviews.author: J.Efaw

customer_reviews.title: ALWAYS THOROUGHLY READ THE DESCRIPTION AND REVIEWS
customer_reviews.text: KNITTING KIT FOR MY BARBIE!! The one time I didn’t read the description or the reviews......
customer_reviews.author: Amandatory

customer_reviews.title: The reviews I read are correct in the fact that ...
customer_reviews.text: The reviews I read are correct in the fact that the scissors are oily and need to be cleaned before using them.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good over all but as I said half the ...
customer_reviews.text: Is a sewing/knitting kit. Pretty good over all but as I said half the items included are for sewing. Can be a bonus if you sew also.
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: Very good for a newbie
customer_reviews.text: Has all the basic tools. Very good for a newbie. However, it took almost a month to receive it from the sender.
customer_reviews.author: E. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the stuff in this little box...everything that i needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality is very poor, but I guess that accounts for the price. Serves the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Choptank Gram

customer_reviews.title: Great for knitting gifts.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for an inexpensive quick kit to put into a swap kit. The scissors are very sharp, and better than expected. Great compact kit, but long wait for shipping.
customer_reviews.author: T. Beck

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel craft bag!
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised how nice of a kit this actually is. I bought it to put into my knitting/crochet travel bag so that I would not lose all of my tools in the bottom of the bag. The little case keeps everything organized. I love the little scissors, tape measure, cabling tool, and point protectors. Great for the crafter on the go!
customer_reviews.author: JSquare

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good value and it introduced me to gourd shaped safety pins that make EXCELLENT stitch markers.
customer_reviews.author: nanatana

customer_reviews.title: ... and very handy for knitting and other fiber crafts like rug making and locker hooking
customer_reviews.text: inexpensive and very handy for knitting and other fiber crafts like rug making and locker hooking
customer_reviews.author: Little Buddy S.

customer_reviews.title: The scissors are sharp
customer_reviews.text: The scissors are great for cutting thread. The other accessories also help me make patterns. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good deal
customer_reviews.text: There is a LOT in this kit, at an excellent price. Worth waiting for the slow shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Salome Ellen

customer_reviews.title: easily carried but the latch isn't real secure
customer_reviews.text: Small and compact, easily carried but the latch isn't real secure.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Stottlemeyer

customer_reviews.title: Markers break easily
customer_reviews.text: Not used all the parts yet but the safety pin type markers break very easily. Not useful at all. Hopefully the other pieces are more durable, but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Agonzo

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: just as the pictures show... great item at a geat price... also arrived over 3 weeks early
customer_reviews.author: Chris'Mrs.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lots of goodies in a good box. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mae Newman

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This has everything you need in one little case. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: happyin0420

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice little set for knitters, everything you need in one small case.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and very useful for someone who loves knitting
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: you need to fix the latch it is not good.!!
customer_reviews.author: Garry

customer_reviews.title: So useful.  A must have!
customer_reviews.text: This is really useful. A great kit to toss in my purse.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Dean

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am delighted with the purchase. The recipients of the gifts were thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best thing for beginner knitters
customer_reviews.text: Came earlier than expected! The only problem is the tape measure which i quickly replaced with my own
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Braband

customer_reviews.title: So handy!
customer_reviews.text: I use so many of the handy little tools in this compact box! It's so convenient to take with me wherever I take my knitting.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Alseph

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase! 2 types of locking stitch markers, ring markers... LOVE IT! Totally worth the price! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: conniecgi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent kit for the price. Took time to receive because of customs
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Just like the kit description described everything was there. I wish it could ship quicker but it did come from a far of land. lol
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great item... totally worth the price for all you get with it!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice kit, a lot of useful items for knitters.
customer_reviews.author: Grace M Conway

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and has TONS of useful tools for the beginning knitter.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: great i guess?!?!?!?
customer_reviews.text: i hope it is good not sure still waiting for it so idk
customer_reviews.author: adriana

customer_reviews.title: Outop new basic knitting tools
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the tool kit and love the scissors ! Came right on time
customer_reviews.author: diane creamer

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, basic starter kit for knitters. While I accept it was a rather inexpensive collection of yarn markers, tip holders, and other assorted accouterments, that does not excuse passing off a tape measure that is glaringly inaccurate and filthy shears. I purchased before seeing the other review noting the same inconsistency with the tape measure. As for the cool looking scissors, they were grimy and sticky fresh from the plastic box.
customer_reviews.author: Megan C.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, so you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: It arrived from the seller (heroneo) broken. That said, it was obvious I got what I paid for, which was disappointing considering the high marks it was given over all. And it was the case that was a big reason that I wanted this particular product. There was also no list of contents so that this beginning knitter would know what was what. That sounds like a small thing, and indeed it would be insignificant if I were an experienced knitter, but I am not. So now I have a broken plastic box of stuff that I don't know what most of it is.
customer_reviews.author: M. Allgood

customer_reviews.title: When I got it I thought it was very small ...
customer_reviews.text: When I got it I thought it was very small but the more I use it the more I appreciate how compact it is and how many accessories it has. I have it by my side every time I start knitting.
customer_reviews.author: Anamar

customer_reviews.title: Dxhycc New Basic Knitting Tools Accessories Supplies With Case Knit Kit Lots
customer_reviews.text: bought this kit because the needle point protectors I am using were purchased in the 80's and have hardened with time so I planned on buying just that until I saw these. Now after having this a few months of using the needle stoppers I am let down by the quality, on both sizes they wont stay on the needle so the only good thing is the rest of the items that came with it and the case. Will buy better needle stoppers because I am sure I will end up loosing these.
customer_reviews.author: bbboomer1951

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit, ditch the scissors
customer_reviews.text: Got this starter kit when I first started knitting. Great kit with all the basic suppliers. The needle protectors are ok - clover ones are better, but the one in the kit do the job. When I read the reviews, I was worried my measuring tape would be off, but it's not. The only concern with this is the scissors as part of this. They're a little unsafe, and would be worth getting embroidery or small scissors in place of this. Otherwise great starter kit.
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: Meets my needs
customer_reviews.text: I got this kit for the knitting accessories. It is all plastic but it does the job. The scissors work if you use the tip and is nice and small to have on hand. The needle tips work well. The stitch markers are a useful size and open/close easily. I doubt the case will last o min closed on its own.
customer_reviews.author: GWE

customer_reviews.title: Good set; great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little set of tools. I bought it for the cable needles, but the various stitch markers, yarn needles and needle tips have all been very useful. Will buy again if I lose items.
customer_reviews.author: Lauri Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Great compact case for needleworkers who bring their projects on the road!
customer_reviews.text: Handy dandy compact case full of those things you might normally forget to bring when taking a needlework project to appts, or on trips. From snips to stitch holders....it’s in there!
customer_reviews.author: KO'Sulli

customer_reviews.title: Great little kit!
customer_reviews.text: I am an experienced knitter and while I have many of the items in this kit, it is always good to have a kit that has everything all together. The clip-style scissors are excellent..
customer_reviews.author: Julia McG

product_meta.title: Dxhycc New Basic Knitting Tools Accessories Supplies with Case Knit Kit Lots
feature_bullets: This knitting tool is designed with lots new kit ,perfect choice for your family life.
Basic tools for knitting are included in a compact case.
Knit Mate has all your must-have knitting accessories in a convenient pouch.
Perfect gift for a new knitter.
